channel.title: Babel on David Wesst
channel.description: Recent content in Babel on David Wesst

item.title: How to Build ReactJS with Gulp
item.description: I wanted to play with ReactJS last week and figured I would just add another gulp talk to my build process, being that it’s all the rage right now. It turns out that it wasn’t that simple, as it turns out that the gulp-react has been “deprecated in favor of gulp-babel”. I hadn’t planned on learning Babel, but it turns out it wasn’t very difficult once I was able to put all the pieces together.
